name: Command and Scripting Interpreter: PowerShell
detection: Alert on encoded PowerShell commands
Monitor Office applications spawning PowerShell
Detect suspicious PowerShell network connections

name: Windows Command Shell
detection: Monitor suspicious cmd.exe command chains
Alert on cmd.exe spawned from Office or scripting engines

name: Visual Basic
detection: Detect VBScript execution from temporary directories
Monitor script hosts spawning system utilities

name: User Execution
detection: Alert when Office apps spawn script interpreters
Monitor suspicious child processes of document readers

name: OS Credential Dumping
detection: Alert on access to LSASS process memory
Detect credential dumping tool execution
false_positives: Security tools accessing LSASS for monitoring

name: Windows Management Instrumentation
detection: Monitor remote WMI process creation
Alert on suspicious WMIC command usage

name: Boot or Logon Autostart Execution
detection: Monitor registry Run key modifications
Detect suspicious scheduled task creation

name: Process Injection
detection: Monitor memory injection behavior
Alert on suspicious remote thread creation
false_positives: Security software injecting into processes for monitoring

name: Signed Binary Proxy Execution
detection: Alert on unusual LOLBin command-line usage
Monitor system binaries executing remote content

name: Credentials from Password Stores
detection: Monitor access to browser credential stores
Detect dumping of stored credentials

name: Obfuscated Files or Information
detection: Detect encoded or obfuscated command-line usage
Alert on certutil decoding operations

name: Impair Defenses
detection: Alert on security tool tampering
Monitor commands that disable AV or firewall

name: Indicator Removal on Host
detection: Detect clearing of Windows event logs
Monitor mass log deletion behavior

name: Ingress Tool Transfer
detection: Monitor suspicious file downloads via command line
Detect unusual outbound file transfer activity

name: System Information Discovery
detection: Detect suspicious system enumeration commands
Monitor recon commands from unusual processes

name: System Network Configuration Discovery
detection: Monitor network enumeration activity
Detect recon commands executed in sequence

name: Remote Services
detection: Monitor remote execution tools usage
Alert on lateral movement via admin tools

name: Application Layer Protocol
detection: Detect suspicious outbound traffic patterns
Monitor unusual DNS or HTTP request behavior
